text: Physical abuse is a form of abuse which causes feelings of pain, injury, or other physical suffering. Physical abuse may lead to low self-esteem and other mental problems. ==Types of physical abuse== Physical abuse has many forms. A few examples of physical abuse are: * Striking or hitting * Punching * Slapping * Whipping * Striking with an object * Pinching * Kicking * Strangling * Drowning * Sleep deprivation * Freezing * Burning * Electric shock * Cutting * Poisoning * Withholding food or medication * Assault * Neglect * Torture * Any other excessive physical treatment. Category:Abuse
title: Physical abuse
